original: intros d a s m Hbase Hgetd Hgetm. induction d as [| a' s' | d1 IHd1 d2 IHd2]. - destruct m; simpl; auto. - destruct m; simpl in *. + destruct (a =? a')%N eqn:Heq. * apply N.eqb_eq in Heq. subst. rewrite Hgetd in Hgetd. injection Hgetd. intros; subst. inversion Hgetm. auto. * auto. + auto. - destruct m; simpl. + auto. + apply M2. * apply IHd1; auto. * apply IHd2; auto.
